text: Jacob Isaiah Pace (born September 6, 1998) is an American entrepreneur. He is most known for being the founder and CEO of Flighthouse, a short-form digital content studio that was bought by Create Music Group in 2016. He has been awarded Forbes 30 Under 30 and Rolling Stone Future 25. == References == Category:American businesspeople Category:Living people Category:1998 births
title: Jacob Pace
